timeline.bodyText: nit: would be better to name the two as preVisitField(...)  & postVisitField(...) ?
timeline.author: openinx

replies.bodyText:
Why do you prefer those names? I think they capture the same information.
I'm going to go ahead and merge this since @chenjunjiedada is hitting the problem, but we can rename these later if we think that there is value.
replies.author: rdblue
